casebody.data:
STATE
v.
James L. JOHNSON. No. 151P16-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 22, 2016. Jeffrey William Gillette, for Johnson, James. *484J. Rick Brown, Associate Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. J. Joy Strickland, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Ted Bell, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd of April 2016 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 22nd of April 2016."
